title: Pushing, need supp. Silver onwards
body:
Finished gold on one of my accounts and plat on the other last season. Got placed in silver, so im looking for someone around that level to support me. Im a solid adc and will follow what my support does in lane. I can carry teamfights well with my positioning.

I took a long break inbetween but looking to win some games now.

If you're a solid support player, who doesn't rage at all then add me up. Idc if youre silver gold bronze as long as you have a positive attitude and a good support pool of champs then we can run it. 

Brickk

replies.body:
Hey mate,

Silver Thresh/Bard/Leo/Braum player.

I am a v good Thresh & Bard so if that's the kind of Support you're looking for, add me :)
I'm the best Leona in bronze- which does not say much haha

Yo
Main Leo, Cho and Ali this season. 
Can tank pretty much everything except a Fizz

Hey mate, add me - VenusWilliams 
I main Soraka, Leona and Lux supports

I'm silver atm, and used to main support, before moving to mid lane, however I have been looking to get back into the support role more. Would be keen to at least give it a go. My IGN is Noodle of Power, no pressure to reply if you're not interested. http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Noodle+of+Power+
